alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cumberland and southern Sagadahoc Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Portland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portland, Westbrook, Cumberland, Falmouth, Freeport, Yarmouth, Harpswell, Chebeague Island, Phippsburg and North Yarmouth. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 6 and 17. Interstate 95 between mile markers 49 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Sagadahoc
